name: Dawid Szlachta
bio: Dawid Szlachta is TrueBlocks’ lead developer. Before joining TrueBlocks, Szlachta spent eight years sharpening his skills on various large-scale web applications. However, he is now more interested in developing local-first and privacy friendly software powered by Ethereum and IPFS. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Philology from the University of Warsaw and lives with his wife in Kraków, Poland.
